I come from new England and laugh every time they close schools for 2 or 3 inches. It's no wonder America is so far behind in education..our kids are out of school more than they are in school. Kansas does a better job plowing in some areas. Others, you are lucky if you even see a plow. I worked in missouri, from Independence to the Northland. Plowing is horrible there. If the plowing and salting was done early enough, there should be no reason to cancel school for only a couple of inches. They knew snow was coming. Why weren't they out plowing and salting all night? The highways look barely touched. Ridiculous.
Disgusting! Get rid of this idiot mayor!!

Proverbs 3:5 tells us trust the Lord with all of our heart and not to lean on our own understanding. Have you confessed Jesus as Lord, given Him your whole heart, been baptized and filled with the Holy Spirit? If not, then that would explain your lack of understanding. Romans 10:9-10 tells us how we are to be saved. No Holy Spirit, no understanding of the scriptures. 1Corinthians 2:14-16 explains how revelation by the Holy Spirit works.
